org.apache.felix.ipojo.extender.internal.processor

Class ComponentsBundleProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.felix.ipojo.extender.internal.processor.ComponentsBundleProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BundleProcessor, Lifecycle

    public class ComponentsBundleProcessor
extends Object
implements BundleProcessor
    Processor handling the IPOJO_HEADER and IPOJO_HEADER_ALT header from the bundle manifest.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  ComponentsBundleProcessor.ComponentsAndInstances
      Container storing the components and instances declared by a bundle.

      • IPOJO_HEADER

        public static final String IPOJO_HEADER
        iPOJO Component Type and Instance declaration header.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • IPOJO_HEADER_ALT

        public static final String IPOJO_HEADER_ALT
        iPOJO Component Type and Instance declaration header (alternative). This header was introduced because of BND supporting only header starting with an uppercase.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • COMPONENT_INSTANCE_ATTRIBUTE

        public static final String COMPONENT_INSTANCE_ATTRIBUTE
        The attribute used in instance configuration specifying the targeted component (i.e. factory).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • parse

        private void parse(org.osgi.framework.Bundle bundle,
         String components)
            throws IOException,
                   ParseException
        Parses the internal metadata (from the manifest (in the iPOJO-Components property)). This methods creates factories and add instances to the instance creator.
        Parameters:
        bundle - the owner bundle.
        components - The iPOJO Header String.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the manifest can not be found
        ParseException - if the parsing process failed

      • handleInstanceDeclaration

        private void handleInstanceDeclaration(org.osgi.framework.Bundle bundle,
                             Dictionary instance)
        Extracts and builds the declaration attached to an instance.
        Parameters:
        bundle - the bundle declaring the instance
        instance - the instance configuration (parsed from the header)

      • handleTypeDeclaration

        private void handleTypeDeclaration(org.osgi.framework.Bundle bundle,
                         Element metadata)
        Adds a component factory to the factory list.
        Parameters:
        metadata - the new component metadata.
        bundle - the bundle.

      • getComponentsAndInstances

        private ComponentsBundleProcessor.ComponentsAndInstances getComponentsAndInstances(org.osgi.framework.Bundle bundle)
        Gets the ComponentsBundleProcessor.ComponentsAndInstances declared by the given bundle.
        Parameters:
        bundle - the bundle
        Returns:
        the set of component and instances declared by the bundle, null otherwise
